@hjafarpour Jenkins failure seems related:

```
org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.StreamPartitionAssignorTest > shouldNotLoopInfinitelyOnMissingMetadataAndShouldNotCreateRelatedTasks FAILED
    org.apache.kafka.streams.errors.StreamsException: Could not create internal topics.
        at org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.InternalTopicManager.makeReady(InternalTopicManager.java:73)
        at org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.StreamPartitionAssignor.prepareTopic(StreamPartitionAssignor.java:611)
        at org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.StreamPartitionAssignor.assign(StreamPartitionAssignor.java:370)
        at org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.StreamPartitionAssignorTest.shouldNotLoopInfinitelyOnMissingMetadataAndShouldNotCreateRelatedTasks(StreamPartitionAssignorTest.java:892)

```

```
org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.internals.StreamPartitionAssignorTest > testAssignWithStates STARTED
Build timed out (after 180 minutes). Marking the build as aborted.
```
@guozhangwang @dguy @enothereska
LGTM thanks
LGTM thanks
LGTM thanks

@mjsax Do you think it might be good to put it both in `KGroupedStreamImpl`/`KGroupedTableImpl` and also in `InternalTopicConfig` in case other, new code tries to use InternalTopicConfig as well?
Sounds like a good idea to me. Maybe we can put it as an assertion into `InternalTopicConfig` ?

```
./gradlew -PscalaVersion=2.11 test
./gradlew -PscalaVersion=2.12 test
```

Any update? I've replied to your comment, but have not changed anything, as I haven't seen any clear suggestion... So what do you think?

I believe the main unaddressed comments are, which I'll try to get done today:
- classpath scanning for `TransformationRecommender` https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2299#discussion_r94883358  
- schemaless support for `InsertIn{Key,Value}` https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2299#discussion_r94886997  
- `SchemaUpdateCache` size of 1 probably bad around migrations https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2299#discussion_r94887184   
- system test timestamp comparison robustness https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2299#discussion_r95101630  
- resolve what to do with filtering and `commitRecord()` callbacks for source tasks https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2299#discussion_r94884317
